title: Calculate Quarterly Sales Tax
description: An online retail business needs to calculate and prepare its quarterly state sales tax return.

tasks.description: Import the total sales data for the quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports sales transaction data.

tasks.description: Separate sales by jurisdiction and distinguish between taxable and non-taxable sales.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly segregates sales based on location and taxability.

tasks.description: Calculate the total sales tax due for each jurisdiction and prepare the state sales tax return for filing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the tax owed and prepares the final return.
